author: Joe Rossignol
title: Apple Says There Won't Be a 27-Inch iMac With Apple Silicon
description:
Apple has confirmed to The Verge that it has no plans to release a new 27-inch iMac with Apple silicon.





From the report:Apple PR representative Starlayne Meza confirmed the company’s plans to The Verge. The company encourages those who have been holding …
content:
Apple has confirmed to The Verge that it has no plans to release a new 27-inch iMac with Apple silicon.
